mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_stock_application_order ( id,order_id,spec_id,spec_price,goods_id, stock_number,give_number,surplus_number,stock_application_id,create_user_id, create_time,enterprise_id,currency,ware_house_id,box_id, stock_type,record_id,sort ) VALUES
( #{item.id},#{item.orderId},#{item.specId},#{item.specPrice},#{item.goodsId}, #{item.stockNumber},#{item.giveNumber},#{item.surplusNumber},#{item.stockApplicationId},#{item.createUserId}, now(),#{item.enterpriseId},#{item.currency},#{item.wareHouseId},#{item.boxId}, #{item.stockType},#{item.recordId},#{item.sort} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_stock_application_order WHERE stock_application_id = #{stockApplicationId} order by sort ascs
